description:
As a merchant
  I want to Bulk Change Payment Status
name: Bulk Change Payment Status

steps.name: I am on Admin Login Page
I fill correct account email to email field
I fill correct account password to password field
I click on login button
I should see successful login
I check intercom message notification frame and click clear intercom message button
I check intercom message notification frame and click intercom message close button
I check new feature alert notification frame and click new feature alert close button
I check and click exclude products panel close button
I check and click no thanks button
I am on Basic Setting Page
I mark the value of shop name field as variable shop name
I am on Shop Product Index Page
I input "4th Product for Checkout" to search field
1st product of products list should contain '4th Product for Checkout'

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"4th Product for CheckoutNT$20NT$10","expectText":"4th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: I click on 1st product of products list
I should be redirected to Shop Product Show Page
I click on add to cart button
I should see cart panel
I click on checkout button
I should be redirected to Shop Cart Page
I select country dropdown option included "Taiwan" of country list dropdown
I wait for 3 seconds for loading
I select delivery dropdown option included "Custom Delivery" of delivery method dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["7-11 Pickup only (C2C)","7-11 Pickup and pay in store (B2C)","7-11 Pickup only (B2C)","7-11 Pickup and pay in store (C2C)","Family Mart Pickup and pay in store (C2C)","Family Mart Pickup only (C2C)","(DBW) No integration 711 Pickup","(DBW) - LocalDelivery","(DBW) CustomDelivery","(DBW) Family Mart B2C - Pickup and pay in store","(DBW) Ezship pickup and pay in store","(DBW) 7-11 C2C - Pickup only","(DBW) 7-11 B2C - Pickup and pay in store","Family Mart Pickup only (B2C)","Family Mart Pickup and pay in store (B2C)","Family Mart Pickup (no integration)","Custom Delivery","ezship pickup and pay in store","Local Delivery","7-11 Pickup (no integration)"],"text":"Custom Delivery"}

steps.name: I wait for 3 seconds for loading
I select payment dropdown option included "Custom" of payment method dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["CVS - ECpay with wrong key","Credit Card via O'Pay","CVS via O'Pay","Taishin","ATM via O'Pay","WebATM via O'Pay","Credit Card via ECpay","Custom","Barcode via ECpay","CVS via ECpay","LINE Pay","Cash on Delivery","Credit card or Paypal (Paypal Express)","Bank Transfer"],"text":"Custom"}

steps.name: I wait for 3 seconds for loading
I click on proceed to checkout button
I should be redirected to Shop Checkout Page
I fill name to name field
I fill email to email address field
I fill phone to contact number field
I click on same as checkbox
I click on agree terms checkbox
I click on accept marketing checkbox
I click on place order button
I should be redirected to Shop Order Confirm Page
I am on Orders Page
I should see select all checkbox
I click on select all checkbox
I should see bulk actions dropdown
I select Update Status of bulk actions dropdown
I select status dropdown option included 'Payment Status' of status type dropdown
I select status dropdown option included 'Paid' of status item dropdown
I click on update button
I should see confirm popover
I click on send notification checkbox
I click on OK button
I should see row of payment status
I should not see loading icon
1st row of payment status should equal to "Paid"
I wait for 200 seconds for mail sent
I am on Google Mail Page
I should see account field
I fill customer email to account field
I click on identifier next button
I should see password field
I input account password to password field
I check and click password next button
I should see search field
I input shop name to search field
I should see search mail list
search mail list should contain "Payment status is updated to: Paid"
